name: Bitcoin hardware & accessories
description:
Outline drawings of popular Bitcoin hardware devices and accessories. These can be useful for educational UI screens to communicate more visually. I created many of these initially for the Bitcoin Design Guide, for pages like the Hardware overview one. You can find production-ready SVG and PNG assets in this Github repo.


All commercial products outlined have reference links to the respective company sites. Rights to included logos, trademarks, etc obviously remain with their owners.


Let me know if there are any devices I should add or changes and improvements you'd like to see.


March 18, 2021

Cleanup for consistency. Added Github repo link that contains exported assets in PNG and SVG formats.


March 10, 2021

Added OpenDime, CypherWheel and Satochip per Twitter requests.
